item.title: Amazing Drone Footage Shows Awesome Crop Circle Close To Wiltshire, UK
item.description:
Amazing Drone Footage Shows Awesome Crop Circle Close To Wiltshire, UK

This amazing aerial footage shot from a drone shows an apparent crop circle formation that has appeared in a field at Ansty near Salisbury, Wiltshire, UK and discovered on August 12, 2016. â€‹Several symbols in the circle depict the prime of life with 19 circles and 36 overlapping arches that form a hexagon, like similar mysteriously symbols previously found in ancient cultures?

item.title: Crop Circles-Costly Works of Art or Alien Messages?
item.description:
Crop Circles-Costly Works of Art or Alien Messages?

Crop circles are spectacular open world exhibits of sacred geometry that covers hundreds of feet of crop. This phenomenon is actively observed and studied in the most scientific way possible by the many groups of paranormal enthusiasts.

item.title: Alien Megastructure Discovered Around a Far Off Star?
item.description:
Alien Megastructure Discovered Around a Far Off Star?

Astronomers may have discovered a huge Alien structure around a star, possibly 'harvesting' energy off it. Could this be one of the first great finds by the Kepler Space Telescope? It appears so! A star which has been identified by the Kepler Space Telescope may harbour structures which could point to an advanced technological civilisation surrounding it.
